1373: Harderico was born in Lange gracht in 1373.
1393: Harderico moved to Lievevrouwe kerch.D.1 after marriage.
Got married to Linnea at age 21 in 1393.
1398: Had a daughter with Linnea, Wendelmodis, at age 25.
1385: Lost sibling Aleberna in 1385 when Aleberna was 14.
1386: Lost mother at the age of 13 in childbirth.
1394: Had a son with Linnea, Sanse, at age 21.
1395: Had a daughter with Linnea, Soeten, at age 22.
1397: Had a daughter with Linnea, Marisseis, at age 24.
